detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Esm.shutdown() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#190-195):
	External calls:
	- tokenStake.updateIndex() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#192)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- time = block.timestamp (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#193)

detectors.description:
Esm (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#111-197) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- Owned.nominatedOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#6)
	- Owned.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#5)
	- Owned.nominateNewOwner(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#14-17)
	- Owned.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#29-35)
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#19-27)
	- Owned.onlyOwner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#29-35)
	- Owned.nominateNewOwner(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#14-17)
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Esm.sol#19-27)
